ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
ygData.msgSnippet: You may want to look into Defragmenting the hard drive.  Under Start/Programs/Accessories/System Tools. Sometimes the problems you describe occur when the zone
ygData.messageBody:
You may want to look into Defragmenting the hard
drive. Under Start/Programs/Accessories/System Tools.
Sometimes the problems you describe occur when the
zone files have become fragmented. Also, you might
want to see about increasing her memory (RAM).
Windows 98 needs atleast 64megs to work properly.. EQ
really requires at least 128.. 256 even better.
Memory these days is pretty cheap.

Ves
